Best of Brittany

Go Beyond Mixes It Up

20th – 27th August 2025

Fully Booked

What's to get excited about!

We invite you to our first summer in the north-west of France, and the Celtic region of Brittany. We will be based in the beautiful, small central village of Mellionnec, where we’ll be staying in a large gite named A La Belle Etoile (The Beautiful Star). The gite was renovated in 2022 and was formerly an old presbytery but is now a beautiful and modern auberge, situated in this small, alternative and progressive community in the lush, green summer Breton countryside.

This holiday will be a mix of what we consider to be the best activities and experiences from our adventure and culture holidays in Brittany.

If you like the idea of exploring this stunning region but also fancy trying your hand at a couple of the adventure activities, this could be just what you are looking for. We will be stimulating your cultural side with visits to the Chateau de Josselin as well as hitting the beach on the Quiberon peninsula via the Tire-Bouchon train. Plus, we’ll be enjoying the local wolf refuge and taking in a quirky visit to the Univers du Poète Ferrailleur or in English ‘The Universe of the Poet’s Junkyard!’

And from the adventure holiday, we will be testing your archery accuracy and getting our feet wet (but hopefully nothing else!) whilst kayaking on the nearby Lake Guerlédan.

This holiday will appeal to all your senses and we can’t wait for you to join us in beautiful Brittany!

Where you'll be staying...

A La Belle Etoile is a brand new gite. It has been designed to accommodate all types of people, including summer groups like ours.

Food, glorious food!

All of our food will be lovingly prepared and cooked by our wonderful chef, Helen.

What you'll experience...

We will meet at a London airport and you will be supported on the flight to Nantes Atlantique Airport in France.

Our mini-buses will take you on the 2 hour and 30-minute drive to the accommodation, with stops along the way.

Your holiday will include the following:

  • 7 night, full board accommodation.
  • All entrance fees to all activities and sites.
  • Airport transfers and transport in and around France.
  • Return flight from London to Nantes, accompanied and supported by our Go Beyond team.
  • A ratio of 2 guests to 1 Go Beyond support staff member.
  • Support from our Go Beyond team during the holiday.

    • Accessiblility and Inclusion

    Inclusion is important to us so we strive, whenever possible, to make our holidays accessible to all.

    If you wish to discuss your specific access requirement for any of our holidays, please contact us at your earliest convenience and we will do everything we can to welcome you to the Go Beyond Holidays experience.

    Day 4

    Day 6

    Day 7
    Kayaking on Lake Guerlédan.

    Day 8
    Drive back to Nantes Atlantique Airport for flight back to London.
